 when

f i have

The running theory i=
s this: The entity only needs some complex noise source 
 (whatever that ma=
y be) in or to modulate or demodulate (change) the signal 
to  form communi=
cation. A lot of the radios are used (Frank's box, shack 
hacks,  minibox o=
r whatever) because they put out a complex noise signal with 
a lot of  hum=
an voice tones in them. It is thought that it would be easier 
for them to =
 manipulate the voice tones than to try to manipulate random 
noise.

I  pe=
rsonally use silence to record, which really isn't silence at all but 
just=
  ambient room noise. The signal is run through certain filters and I 
get =
pretty  good solid speech. I have worked with different setups such as the =

hacks and  the like but prefer the more basic forms that, to me are more 
=
reliable and  less questionable.

No matter what you decide to use to recor=
d they will  all work to some 
extent in the end. All you need to communica=
te is the will,  desire and an 
interested entity around you.

Regards,

Fr=
ank  R.
